name: Lost Lands 2 || A platformer
description:
Hey there!

FreezingGlacier is back with his new game :D.

----

This platformer is mobile-friendly (can be played with mobile) while I (FreezingGlacier) highly recommend the usage of laptops or PCs.

- - - -

SOLUTIONS OF THE HARDEST LEVELS (8 & 9).

Level 8

In level 8, the light blue colour is not the sky but the ocean only [therefore, you can swim].

Level 9

In level 9, swim in the right direction passing between the 2 rectangles containing light blue (i.e., don't touch the light blue colour and swim rightwards passing throw the dark blue colour).

__

Controls (which keys/buttons to press):

Laptops/PCs                                                    

ControlsActionUp ArrowJumpRight ArrowMove RightLeft ArrowMove LeftMMute/Unmute (MUSIC)

                                                                     Keys to Press

ButtonsActionGreen FlagStart ProjectRed buttonStop ProjectPause/Un-pause ButtonPause/Un-pause Project

                                                                    Buttons to Press

Mobiles                                                    

ControlsActionClick above player Jump Click right side of player Move Right Click left side of playerMove Left

                                                                     Keys to Press

Buttons Action Green Flag Start Project Red button Stop Project Pause/Un-pause Button Pause/Un-pause Project

                                                                    Buttons to Press

- - -

As always, feel free to give suggestions and ideas!

-- -- --

Thanks!

FreezingGlacier!
